about_the_game:
Prepare to Descend into Darkness
Prepare yourself for the ultimate descent into the unknown. Terraclysm awaits—will you rise to the challenge or be consumed by the darkness?

Wishlist now and be the first to explore the depths!

Terraclysm is an action-packed single-player or cooperative RPG set in a vast, mysterious, and deadly subterranean world. Explore the biomes of Terraclysm, each with its unique environment, enemies, and secrets. Take on the role of Arin Stone, a Geckomancer who wields powerful geckos that morph into mighty entities when shot out of his blaster, using them to battle the forces of darkness led by the malevolent Kael Draven. Team up with friends in co-op mode, or brave the depths alone as you uncover the ancient secrets of Terraclysm and confront the dark energy known as Umbramire that threatens to consume everything.



  • Gecko Morphing Blaster Combat: Unleash your geckos by shooting them out of your blaster, instantly transforming them into powerful, morphed entities with unique abilities. Use fire-breathing geckos to incinerate your enemies or water-based geckos to heal allies and flood the battlefield.
  • Elemental Synergy: Combine gecko abilities with the environment to create devastating effects. Set enemies ablaze by igniting the flammable gases in Pyros Abyss, or freeze them in place with ice attacks in Frostspire Peaks.
  • Strategic Arsenal: Collect rare and legendary geckos as you explore the biomes, each bringing new powers and tactical advantages. Build your perfect team and discover the excitement of assembling a powerful arsenal to dominate the battlefield.

  • Aurelia Forest: A bioluminescent wonderland teeming with life and illusion, where danger lurks behind every glowing tree.
  • Pyros Abyss: A volcanic wasteland filled with rivers of lava, scorching heat, and aggressive, fire-infused Umbragecks.
  • Frostspire Peaks: Snow-capped mountains where icy winds howl, and the cold is as deadly as the creatures that inhabit it.
  • Crystalgloom Caverns: A labyrinth of shimmering crystals, where echoes can drive you mad, and the paths are always shifting.
  • Noxious Expanse: A toxic wasteland filled with poisonous gases and mutated creatures, where survival is a constant battle.

  • Engage in a Deep Narrative: Uncover the history of Terraclysm, the origins of the Umbramire, and the truth behind the ancient Eclipse Gate. Every quest reveals more about the world and its people.
  • Compelling Characters: Meet a cast of memorable characters, including Ferris Vulcan, the master Blaster Smith, and Mira Thornbrew, the lively pub owner. Each character has their own story and side quests that deepen your connection to the world.
  • Dark Force: Face off against Kael Draven, a former Geckomancer turned dark warlord, who seeks to control the Umbramire and conquer Terraclysm with his army of Umbragecks.

  • Team Up: Join forces with friends in cooperative mode to explore the biomes, tackle challenging dungeons, and take on powerful bosses together.
  • Shared Progression: Progress through the story and level up your characters together, sharing loot and crafting materials to build the ultimate Geckomancer team.

  • Main Questline: Follow Arin Stone’s journey from novice Geckomancer to legendary hero, as he battles Kael Draven and uncovers the secrets of the ancient world.
  • Side Quests: Dive into over 100 side quests that take you deeper into the lore of Terraclysm. From defending the Ironclad Forge to purging corruption from the Umbragecks, every quest offers unique challenges and rewards.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Confront massive bosses that guard the biomes, each requiring strategy and skill to defeat. Prepare for a fight—these creatures are not easily slain.

  • Blaster Smithing: Visit Vulcan’s Forge to craft and upgrade your blasters. Use rare materials from each biome to create weapons that suit your playstyle.
  • FeroxBot Mounts: Ride into battle on powerful FeroxBots, each customizable with different armaments and abilities. Beware the corrupted FeroxBots, which can turn on you in an instant if the Umbramire takes hold.
  • Gear and Equipment: Collect and craft powerful gear to enhance your abilities. Customize your armor and weapons with elemental attributes and special effects to dominate your enemies.

Beneath the surface of the Earth lies Terraclysm, a vast and perilous underground world. For centuries, the people of Luminos have lived in relative peace, harnessing the power of geckos to survive in the harsh environments of the subterranean biomes. But now, a dark force known as Umbramire has begun to seep into the world, corrupting everything it touches.

Kael Draven, a once-promising Geckomancer, has discovered the power of Umbramire and is using it to build an army of corrupted creatures called Umbragecks. With this army, he seeks to conquer all of Terraclysm and rule over its people with an iron fist.

You are Arin Stone, a young Geckomancer determined to stop Kael Draven and cleanse the world of the Umbramire. Armed with a blaster crafted by Ferris Vulcan and riding atop a mighty FeroxBot, you will journey through the five biomes of Terraclysm, face off against the forces of darkness, and uncover the ancient secrets that lie hidden in the depths.

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 H series or AMD Ryzen 5 H series equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 (H or K series)/AMD Ryzen series equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
